body: Foreign Notes writes about the latest Euro 2012 controversy in Ukraine: "In other words, the Ukrainian national team could find itself banned from the Euro 2012 football tournament that the country is itself hosting..."
original_body: Foreign Notes writes about the latest Euro 2012 controversy in Ukraine: "In other words, the Ukrainian national team could find itself banned from the Euro 2012 football tournament that the country is itself hosting..."
title: Ukraine: The Newest Euro 2012 Scandal
